Html:
Hello,

Since I've no more use for this project, I kind of let it down for a long time. But seeing its popularity, I'll update it as soon as possible.
I want to make it more robust and stable. I also need to freeze some brushes that are still unfrozen to optimize it a lot more.

Stay tuned ;-)

Hello,

Thanks for sharing this wonderful control.

Do you have a roadmap for this project? Because the project seems to be dead...
